position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 11330212, 'name': 'Chloe J Hill Consulting', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQGqiU2Kn_o41g/company-logo_400_400/0/1519941969705?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=t87DDH9f_HDSKiG2BgZXSZ_91ascV3SN7wm1TvGqNwo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/cjhcontentdesign/', 'employees': {'start': 0, 'end': 1}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Global', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Chloe J Hill Consulting', 'description': "www.chloejhill.com | Having successfully established and run a global environment network and then a sustainability communications agency in the Netherlands, I am now fully dedicated to my independent freelance track and offering where I specialise in sustainability transformation and future readiness. 

I work with conscious leaders and impact-driven organisations to propel and shape the global sustainability movement. By leveraging a powerful combination of sensemaking, strategic communications, deep sustainability expertise, futures strategy and conscious leadership approaches, I level up the organisational leadership that is needed to help secure our collective sustainable future on this planet. Clients include United Nations agencies, International Development Banks, National Governments, various International NGOs as well as sustainability-driven start-ups and and SMEs.

Are you wanting to get ready for whats next? Let's talk! chloe@chloejhill.com", 'title': 'Sustainability Transformationist - Research, Sensemaking, Communications, Strategy & Futures', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 76538860, 'name': 'HuckleBe', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHbT_gpRJ6Aqg/company-logo_400_400/0/1635151203836?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=3hwZnE_2I2fbT0yJYSko9ZfsbQFRJOYccYsgpIaEfdQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/hucklebe/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'HuckleBe', 'description': 'www.hucklebe.com | Co-founder of a strategic communications consultancy - a spin off from the Altus Impact network (see below) - on a mission to propel sustainable futures. Working with impact-driven organisations to amplify your sustainability voice, boost your brand resilience and shore you up as an influential leader. From bold, intuitive and forward-thinking strategies to content that captures to mind-shifting trainings - we reimagine new ways for you to elevate your impact. 

Project examples include: -Successfully positioning a new food sustainability company in Hong Kong; - Delivering a range of effective strategic communications (both internal and external) for a sustainability standards assurance company in Germany to boost their sustainability voice, purpose positioning and direction; - Providing training to a system thinking consultancy in Amsterdam to shore up both their external and internal communications capacity; - Annual reporting (both content and design) for various clients in the sustainability field that speaks boldly to intentions, lessons learned and failing forwards; - Impact branding for a sustainable plastics start-up in the UK.', 'title': 'Co-Founder', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 10647833, 'name': 'Altus Impact', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQGT-qxLX2CyJQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1680865187569?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qoDX57dtri5bG1BV8q_kZcrY1pWAMgwj_rSb9obK6j0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/altusimpact/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Europe', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Altus Impact', 'description': 'www.altusimpact.com | Co-founder of and advisor for a global and collaborative network of sustainability and communications consultants working with the public & private sector to find solutions to pressing development and environment challenges. Clients include various UN agencies, government aid agencies, NGOs, social enterprises where Altus consultants, through a combination of cutting edge research, sustainability strategy and communications, have transformed and elevated the impact of their programmes and projects. The network is still going strong and continues to deliver impact across the international development sector. After 5 happy and impactful years, I stepped out to to build a spin off strategic communications company, HuckleBe.', 'title': 'Network Co-Founder & Sustainability Communications Advisor', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 166973, 'name': 'World Wildlife Fund', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGaVS3n5qIyUg/company-logo_400_400/0/1646664128378?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=WRD-9EzwzxRTDa_m0288MvpXD8e-hxq8LjU7Wyboyis', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/world-wildlife-fund/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Mekong Region - Cambodia, Laos, Thailand, Myanmar and Vietnam', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'World Wildlife Fund', 'description': 'Successfully implemented a regional green economy initiative for the WWF across the Greater Mekong Countries (Laos, Myanmar, Thailand, Vietnam and Cambodia). This included the delivery of technical, strategic and communications advice across all 5 national WWF offices as well as to other relevant national and regional actors on green economy related themes which has helped to both transform regional environmental policy-making as well as strengthen regional, national and local sustainability efforts.', 'title': 'Regional Technical & Communications Advisor', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1809, 'name': 'European Commission', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQHCwyP0GmVfZQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1684393078705?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=NhOQkuAVkiq626bYmw-SYDaxvX3Jvmdu_B1khC0EeNo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/european-commission/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Geneva/Brussels', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'European Commission', 'description': 'As part of an international consulting team, executed an assessment of financial flows (non-overseas development assistance) available for/going to biodiversity projects from the EU to developing countries. The study enabled the EU to identify new sources of biodiversity financing internationally for improved global conservation efforts.', 'title': 'Advisor, Researcher & Writer - Biodiversity & Climate Finance', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 13143, 'name': 'IUCN', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHo52DGffuQRQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1656942908773?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=s7g_V0jbaiQl74zbSf14CK9YIo7S8nk2iAqIdFJgr74', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/iucn/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Geneva, Switzerland & San Jose, Costa Rica', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'IUCN', 'description': "Led various research and programme design projects both for IUCN - the world's oldest environmental NGO - Headquarters in Switzerland and also for their Mesoamerican offices, thanks to repeat hire. The outcomes have been wide- reaching including: 
- Conceptualization of a regional transboundary conservation project in Central America (also leveraging my PhD research) which was successfully implemented over 2 phases within a 10-year period where regional protected area management was enhanced and the economic sustainability of communities was improved. 
- Development of the very first publication on International Payments for Ecosystem Services which has helped to inform global policy-making and international programmes around better ecosystem management. 
- Research and analysis, including strategic recommendations for improved governance structures of IUCNs Independent Scientific Review Panel surrounding the conservation of Western Gray Whales.", 'title': 'Advisor, Researcher & Writer - Biodiversity Finance & Environmental Governance', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 2867020, 'name': 'Secretariat of the Convention on Biological Diversity', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEU8k8WeRZvUg/company-logo_400_400/0/1646400924936?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=17FKWgLJ9_wByILz2PUGY6VfKBhEZxYOkB1lhP5XG6A', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/unbiodiversity/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Geneva Area, Switzerland', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'UN Biodiversity', 'description': 'Co-wrote a technical series document for the Convention of Biological Diversity on the economic value of biodiversity in dry and sub-humid lands. This work was subsequently used to inform international decision-making on biodiversity in drylands and has also helped to shape a joint programme of work between the CBD and the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification. See report here: http://www.cbd.int/doc/publications/cbd-ts-071-en.pdf#!', 'title': 'Technical Writer - Economics of Biodiversity', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 10451, 'name': 'UNEP-TEEB (The Economics of Ecosystems and Biodiversity) Office, Geneva', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGE2TbGvv0jnw/company-logo_400_400/0/1571661971293?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=5OFQLSQVCF71R11THKLyzRwASgMN0eFtSGZPG1SDfF8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/unep/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Geneva', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'UN Environment Programme', 'description': "Invited to join the UNEP TEEB (The Economics of Ecosystem and Biodiversity) Office to strategically advise on and produce content for TEEB's key training activities and materials (both online and in-person) on the tools and processes required to undertake ecosystem valuation studies at the national level.
